entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
